    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4

    Facet FormattedTextSubSection_Summary

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4:FormattedTextSubSection_Summary

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<FormattedTextSubSection subCode="Example String Value" subSectionNumber="1234" subTitle="Example String Value" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4">
    <TextParagraph name="paragraph name" number="2345">
        <Text language="en" textFormat="PlainText">Formatted text example.</Text>
        <Image colorSpace="Example String Value" dimensionCategory="Example String Value" format="2" objID="image_1" originalIndicatorInd="true" resolution="4567" sort="3456" version="Example String Value">
            <Identifier organization="Acme" system="sysABC3344" url="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">guid12345</Identifier>
            <ImageRef>image_1</ImageRef>
            <URL>http://www.OpenTravel.org/ns/OTA2/Common_v01_00</URL>
            <Details applicableEnd="2011-07-04" applicableStart="2011-01-24" author="Example String Value" copyrightEnd="2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00" copyrightNotice="Example String Value" copyrightOwner="Example String Value" copyrightStart="2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00" effectiveEnd="2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00" effectiveStart="2011-12-05T06:00:00Z">Example String Value</Details>
            <MultimediaDescription caption="The Empire State Building at sunset." language="en" title="Example String Value"/>
            <DateTimeStamp create="2011-12-05T06:00:00Z" creatorID="c123456789" lastModifierID="m987654321" lastModify="2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00" purge="2011-12-05">2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00</DateTimeStamp>
            <Email defaultInd="true" remark="Example String Value" textFormat="Example String Value" validInd="true">
                <Address>Example String Value</Address>
                <Type>Business</Type>
                <Privacy optInDate="2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00" optInStatus="OptedIn" optOutDate="2011-12-05T06:00:00Z" shareMarketInd="Yes" shareSyncInd="No"/>
            </Email>
            <Dimensions height="2345" unitOfMeasureCode="2" width="1234"/>
            <File name="Example String Value" originalName="Example String Value" size="3456"/>
            <Geolocation altitude="Example String Value" altitudeUnitOfMeasure_Enum="Miles" formatURL="http://www.OpenTravel.org/ns/OTA2/Common_v01_00" latitude="Example String Value" longitude="Example String Value" mapURL="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/>
        </Image>
        <URL>http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema</URL>
        <ParagraphListItem language="en" listItem="1234" text2="Formatted text example." textFormat="HTML"/>
        <DateTimeStamp create="2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00" creatorID="c123456789" lastModifierID="m987654321" lastModify="2011-12-05T06:00:00Z" purge="2011-01-24">2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00</DateTimeStamp>
    </TextParagraph>
</FormattedTextSubSection>

      Example JSON

      {
  "FormattedTextSubSection" : {
    "subTitle" : "Example String Value",
    "subCode" : "Example String Value",
    "subSectionNumber" : 1234,
    "TextParagraph" : [ {
      "@type" : "TextParagraph",
      "name" : "paragraph name",
      "number" : 2345,
      "Text" : [ {
        "value" : "Formatted text example.",
        "language" : "en",
        "textFormat" : "PlainText"
      } ],
      "Image" : [ {
        "@type" : "Image",
        "objID" : "image_1",
        "version" : "Example String Value",
        "format" : "2",
        "dimensionCategory" : "Example String Value",
        "sort" : 3456,
        "resolution" : 4567,
        "colorSpace" : "Example String Value",
        "originalIndicatorInd" : true,
        "Identifier" : {
          "value" : "guid12345",
          "url" : "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema",
          "system" : "sysABC3344",
          "organization" : "Acme"
        },
        "ImageRef" : "image_1",
        "URL" : "http://www.OpenTravel.org/ns/OTA2/Common_v01_00",

          "value" : "Example String Value",

          "copyrightOwner" : "Example String Value",

          "effectiveEnd" : "2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00",
          "applicableStart" : "2011-01-24",
          "applicableEnd" : "2011-07-04"
        },
        "MultimediaDescription" : [ {
          "@type" : "MultimediaDescription",
          "title" : "Example String Value",
          "language" : "en",
          "caption" : "The Empire State Building at sunset.",
          "FormattedTextSubSection" : [ ]
        } ],
        "DateTimeStamp" : {
          "value" : "2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00",
          "create" : "2011-12-05T06:00:00Z",
          "creatorID" : "c123456789",
          "lastModify" : "2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00",
          "lastModifierID" : "m987654321",
          "purge" : "2011-12-05"
        },

          "validInd" : true,
          "defaultInd" : true,

          "Type" : {
            "value" : "Business"
          },

          }
        },

          "value" : null,
          "unitOfMeasureCode" : "2",
          "width" : 1234,
          "height" : 2345
        },

          "value" : null,
          "name" : "Example String Value",
          "size" : 3456,
          "originalName" : "Example String Value"
        },
        "Geolocation" : {
          "value" : null,
          "latitude" : "Example String Value",

          "mapURL" : "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema",

      } ],
      "URL" : [ "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" ],

        "value" : null,

        "language" : "en",
        "textFormat" : "HTML"
      } ],

        "create" : "2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00",

        "lastModify" : "2011-12-05T06:00:00Z",

      }
    } ]
  }
}

      • Property Summary

        Properties 
        Name Description
        TextParagraph
        Details and content of a paragraph for a formatted text message.
        Details
        Type TextParagraph
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required true
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 99

      • Attribute Summary

        Attributes 
        Name Description
        subTitle
        This attribute may be used to provide a title for a sub-section of the formatted free text. A sub-section may have multiple related paragraphs of information. For example, if used to provide driving directions there may be multiple paragraphs, and these paragraphs may be grouped into a sub-section called "Driving from the North". A second subsection may be titled "Driving from the South", and may contain several paragraphs to describe the driving directions when driving from the south.
        Details
        Type StringShort
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        subCode
        An optional code that may be assigned to this sub-section of formatted free text.
        Details
        Type StringTiny
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        subSectionNumber
        This attribute may be used when there is a need to number all of the sub-sections of information that is to be presented.
        Details
        Type http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema:positiveInteger
        Example Value 1234
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
